title: Hard Rock Cafe Singapore - Orchard Road Location
blurb: Located in Orchard Road, Singapore's shopping hub.
description: Hard Rock Cafe Singapore is located at the beginning of Orchard Road, Singapore's premier shopping destination. The cafe offers a family-friendly dining experience with a rock 'n' roll atmosphere. It features a restaurant, bar, and a Rock Shop where you can purchase Hard Rock Cafe merchandise. The venue is accessible by car and public transportation, with parking readily available for cars. While bus parking facilities are not available, the central location makes it easy to reach. Enjoy classic American cuisine and live music in a vibrant setting suitable for families and music lovers of all ages. The cafe provides a unique blend of dining and entertainment.
full_address: Orchard Road is the Shopping hub of Singapore

title: Hard Rock Cafe Singapore - Family Dining Experience
blurb: Enjoy family dining with the Messi Kids Meal options!
description: Hard Rock Cafe Singapore offers a family-friendly dining experience with a special Messi Kids Menu. The menu includes the Messi X Burger and the Messi Golden Chicken Sandwich, along with other kid-friendly favorites such as chicken tenders and Mac & Cheese. It's a great place for families to enjoy a meal together in a fun and vibrant atmosphere. The cafe provides a welcoming environment for children and adults alike, making it an ideal spot for a casual family outing. Enjoy classic American cuisine and rock 'n' roll memorabilia while creating lasting memories with your loved ones. The Messi Kids Meal provides a unique dining experience for the whole family.

title: Hard Rock Cafe Singapore: Family Dining & Music
blurb: Enjoy American classics and local favorites in Singapore.
description: Hard Rock Cafe Singapore, established in 1990, offers a vibrant dining experience in the heart of Singapore's entertainment district. The two-story cafe blends music legends with American classics and local flavors, including the LegendaryÂ® Burger and Chilli Crab Dip. Families can enjoy a range of mouth-watering selections, from burgers to ribs, paired with cocktails and mocktails. The cafe provides a lively atmosphere with great food and company, making it a perfect spot for family dining and music enthusiasts. The cafe also hosts private events.
datetime_display: Mon - Sun 11:30 AM - 9:30 PM DAILY: 11AM - 11PM (Last order at 10PM)

title: Hard Rock Cafe: Messi Kids Menu & Kids Eat Free
blurb: New Messi Kids Menu! Kids eat free on weekends!
description: Enjoy the new Messi Kids Menu at Hard Rock Cafe, designed to make mealtime special for your little ones. On weekends, kids eat free with the purchase of an adult main course. The Greatest Hit 3 Courses Set Lunch is also available on weekdays, offering a starter, main, dessert, and drink. Perfect for families looking for a fun and satisfying dining experience. The cafe provides a family-friendly atmosphere with a rock 'n' roll theme, creating a memorable outing for both kids and adults. Enjoy a variety of dishes and special promotions tailored for families.
datetime_display: Weekends [12-5pm] Kids Eat Free, Weekdays 11.30am - 3pm Set Lunch

title: Hard Rock Cafe - Singapore Family Fun Venue
blurb: Enjoy family fun at Hard Rock Cafe Singapore!
description: Hard Rock Cafe Singapore offers a family-friendly dining experience with a vibrant atmosphere. Enjoy classic American cuisine, rock 'n' roll memorabilia, and a fun environment for kids and adults alike. The cafe features a kids' menu, high chairs, and a lively setting that makes it a great place for families to dine and enjoy music. The venue is perfect for a casual meal or a special celebration. The staff are friendly and accommodating, ensuring a memorable experience for all ages. The cafe also hosts events and parties, making it a versatile choice for family outings. With its central location and iconic status, Hard Rock Cafe Singapore is a must-visit destination for families looking for a fun and entertaining dining experience.
full_address: 50 Cuscaden Road, Hpl House #02-01, Singapore 249724 SG
